程序包 org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.rule.identifier.type

接口 DataNodeContainedRule

  • 所有超级接口:
    ShardingSphereRule
    public interface DataNodeContainedRule
extends ShardingSphereRule
    ShardingSphere rule which contains data node.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      修饰符和类型 方法 说明
      Optional<String> findActualTableByCatalog​(String catalog, String logicTable)
      Find actual table name via catalog.

      Find first actual table name.

      Find logic table name via actual table name.

      Get all data nodes.

      • 从接口继承的方法 org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.rule.ShardingSphereRule

    • 方法详细资料

      • getAllDataNodes

        Map<String,​Collection<DataNode>> getAllDataNodes()
        Get all data nodes.
        返回:
        all data nodes map, key is logic table name, values are data node collection belong to the key

      • getDataNodesByTableName

        Collection<DataNode> getDataNodesByTableName​(String tableName)
        Get data nodes by table name.
        参数:
        tableName - table name
        返回:
        data nodes

      • findFirstActualTable

        Optional<String> findFirstActualTable​(String logicTable)
        Find first actual table name.
        参数:
        logicTable - logic table name
        返回:
        the first actual table name

      • isNeedAccumulate

        boolean isNeedAccumulate​(Collection<String> tables)
        Is need accumulate.
        参数:
        tables - table names
        返回:
        need accumulate

      • findLogicTableByActualTable

        Optional<String> findLogicTableByActualTable​(String actualTable)
        Find logic table name via actual table name.
        参数:
        actualTable - actual table name
        返回:
        logic table name

      • findActualTableByCatalog

        Optional<String> findActualTableByCatalog​(String catalog,
                                          String logicTable)
        Find actual table name via catalog.
        参数:
        catalog - catalog
        logicTable - logic table name
        返回:
        actual table name

      • getAllTables

        Collection<String> getAllTables()
        Get all tables.
        返回:
        all tables
